1 #include <AR2.hpp>

3 namespace tsa {
4 
5  AR2::AR2(const double f, const double gamma, const double h) {
6  double w = 2.0 * M_PI*f;
7  double scale = 1.0 + 0.5 * gamma*h;
8  mA = (2.0 - w * w * h * h) / scale;
9  mB = (0.5 * gamma * h - 1.0) / scale;
10  mC = h * h / scale;
11  mXm1 = 0.0;
12  mXm2 = 0.0;
13  }
14 
15  AR2::~AR2() {
16 
17  }
18 
19  void AR2::operator()(SeqViewDouble& in, SeqViewDouble& out) {
20  Dmatrix* data_in = in.GetData();
21  Dmatrix* data_out = out.GetData();
22 
23  if ((data_in->size2() != data_out->size2()) || (data_in->size1() != data_out->size1())) {
24  data_out->resize(data_in->size1(), data_in->size2());
25  LogWarning("AR2: resizing output view");
26  }
27 
28  execute(*data_in, *data_out, in.GetScale());
29 
30  // Adjust attributes
31  out.SetStart(in.GetStart());
32  out.SetSampling(in.GetSampling());
33  out.SetScale(1.0);
34  }
35 
36  void AR2::execute(Dmatrix& in, Dmatrix& out, double scale) {
37  unsigned int data = in.size2();
38  unsigned int chan = in.size1();
39  // filters all the data
40  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < data; i++) {
41  out(0, i) = mA * mXm1 + mB * mXm2 + scale * mC * in(0, i);
42  mXm2 = mXm1;
43  mXm1 = out(0, i);
44  }
45  }
46 
47 
48 }
